<p>I am a computer scientist, cognitive psychologist, and musician. Currently, I am doing a PhD at Oxford University's <a href="https://www.cs.ox.ac.uk/people/ulrik.lyngs/"> Department of Computer Science</a>, as part of the <a href="https://sociam.org">Social Machines project</a>.</p>

<p>My research focuses on <strong>attention management and self-control in relation to use of digital devices</strong>. Outside academia, I play random instruments in <a href="https://karaokecollective.com">The Karaoke Collective</a>.</p>

I may be available for speaking, teaching, or consultancy in relation to digital self-control and reproducible research with R Markdown, as well as for musical bookings - do <a href="mailto:ulrik.lyngs@cs.ox.ac.uk?Subject=Contact%20through%20ulriklyngs.com" target="_top">get in touch.</a></p>
